explains: adj. 超人的；人类能力所不能及的；属于神仙的

sentences.en: People were beginning to attribute superhuman qualities to him.
sentences.cn: 人们开始赋予他超人的品质。

sentences.en: "These astronauts could be regarded as superhuman beings, " Shi Bingbing said.
sentences.cn: “这些宇航员可以被看作是超人了。” 史冰冰表示。

sentences.en: Officers were terrified of his superhuman strength.
sentences.cn: 警官们被他超凡的力量吓到了。
